message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. We believe its value surpasses $1200000, reflecting its unique features and benefits. For you, we are offering this remarkable product at an exclusive price of $1500000. Please let us know if this proposition aligns with your expectations and budget.

I'm interested in the product, but $1500000 is a bit steep for me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget. Can you consider this offer?
